Customer experience and government services with Clare Martorana, Mina Hsiang, and Jodi Leo 👩‍💻🏛️

Apr 26, 2022

  • civictech
  • government
  • digital services
  • technology
  • customer experience
  • ux
  • CIO
  • services delivery
  • executive order
  • policy

We are joined by Federal Chief Information Officer Clare Martorana, United States Digital Services Administrator Mina Hsiang, and Nava Chief Delivery Officer Jodi Leo. We dive into a conversation about the importance of effective government services delivery and how an executive order focused on customer experience may impact that space.
